# Heading 1

## Heading 2

### Heading 3

Some **bold** and *italic* text.

> Block quote

1. item 1
2. item 2
3. item 3

- item 1
- item 2
- item 3

`code`

## Markdown inside HTML should not render

<div>*b*</div>
## Markdown inside HTML markdown=1 should render

<div markdown="1">*b*</div>

<div markdown=1><user@example.com></div>

<div markdown=1><http://example.com></div>
